about_the_game:
"Tokyo Stranger" is a Japanese psychological horror game with a theme of strange tales. In the game, players take on the role of Yurius, a Ugandan boxer who finds himself in Tokyo, searching for new possibilities for the future.
The game's soundtrack includes 13 original compositions that create different emotional atmospheres, ranging from light and cheerful to tense and terrifying. If you would like to support our game development, you can purchase a soundtrack to enjoy and collect.

Please note that the soundtrack DLC does not include any substantive content that can be displayed in the game program. Not purchasing the soundtrack will not affect the in-game music playback.

name: Tokyo Stranger 东京诡事 Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 210 MB available space
